client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM met Tolvanen Viitanen Niskanen at a yacht party in Helsinki. They enjoyed a scenic cruise and discussed various investment strategies, which marked the beginning of a successful partnership.
Tolvanen Viitanen Niskanen is a 26 year old and comes from Finland.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
client_description_Family_Background: They do not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
In 2018, Tolvanen finished his secondary school education at Nummela lukio.
Tolvanen attended University of Helsinki and graduated in 2023.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Tolvanen Viitanen Niskanen is a 26 year old and comes from Finland.
In 2022, Tolvanen Viitanen Niskanen started working as a Art Dealer at Museum of Contemporary Art Kiasma, marking the beginning of his successful career.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
He managed to save approximately 20000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
Client does not have any properties.In 2019, he received an inheritance of 2380000 EUR from his late grandfather, who was a prominent Stock Trader, and has since invested it in various assets.
client_description_Client_Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in his ability to achieve financial success and security.
